turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, Amanda, this is Sheryl, are you still out of the building? I could use a bit of a pick-me-up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ms. Sheryl, of course, I am by the Starbucks on 4th street, I can grab your usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm actually in the mood for something new today, Amanda. Jake was just telling me about a seasonal mocha they're running?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Black and White mocha? I can see the boards for it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can run in and order one. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti please, I have a bit of a caffeine headache.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And soy milk to go with it? Or they have Almond and Coconut.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually let me try coconut this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, coconut milk it is. And then no whipped cream right? It comes with it automatically.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would rather not risk it, no, but can you ask for extra drizzle on the top instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, Ms. Sheryl. Is there anything else you would like with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think just the coffee for now, we have bagels and things in the breakroom, left over from morning meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We do? I will have to grab one when I get back. And would you like this on the corporate account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a venti Black and White mocha with coconut milk, no whip cream, and extra drizzle? Is that everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's everything!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, ordering now, the receipt should come to your phone in a few minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much Amanda!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, Ms. Sheryl.
